select pi.id, pi.code, pi.address, pi.title, pi.post_name, pi.experience, pi.responsibility, pi.welfare, pi.academic, pi.work_time, pi.work_hour, pi.work_address, pi.work_require, pi.industry_id, pi.create_date, pi.del_flag, pi.enterprise_id, pi.salary, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.nature, ei.industry, ei.images, ini.name as industryName from post_info pi left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = pi.enterprise_id) left join industry_info ini on (ini.id = pi.industry_id) where 1 = 1
AND pi.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pluralismInfo.address},'%')
AND pi.post_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pluralismInfo.postName},'%')
AND pi.enterprise_id = #{pluralismInfo.enterpriseId}
order by pi.create_date desc
